name: Apocalypse Alpha V1
description:
-WINNER of BAFTA YGD 2016 competition-

A text-based survival game set in a post-apocalyptic zombie-infested city, scavenge for supplies and upgrade your character as you struggle to survive in the Apocalypse.

-50 different weapons and 16 armour sets to be found, each fully upgradeable.

-An expanding and evolving turn-based combat system.

-Build a party of allied survivors and rule the Apocalypse!

SOON TO COME:

-Three upgradeable and weaponised vehicles.

-A branching and deep storyline.

-Boss fights and legendary weapons!

This is my first published game and it is still in very early development so I would greatly appreciate any feedback or comments from the community. Thank you for taking the time to play it and support indie developers like me!

Good luck, Survivor!
